DataElement.preferredName: Trail Making Test Error Count Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A neuropsychological test of visual attention and task switching that requires a subject to connect a sequence of 25 consecutive targets.  It provides an easy to administer and reliable assessment of attention, sequencing, cognition, visual search, and motor function.  Trail making test score is number of errors.
